testcase.name: Navigate_To_Website_And_Add_Fridge_Products_To_Cart
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @run scenario: Navigate to website and add fridge products to cart e given Navigate to the url Login to website ... passed in 12.19s when Enter "fridge samsung" in the search box and click on enter ... passed in 5.635s when Fetch all the options and get whose price is less and ratings are high ... passed in 9.613s when Fetch less cost machine and add it to cart ... passed in 0.003466s when Click on cart button ... passed in 0.931s then verify the item is added to the cart ... passed in 16.27s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Navigate_To_Website_And_Add_Washing_Products_To_Cart
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @run scenario: Navigate to website and add washing products to cart e given Navigate to the url Login to website ... passed in 30.75s when Enter "washing machine LG" in the search box and click on enter ... passed in 9.439s when Fetch all the options and get whose price is less and ratings are high ... passed in 14.63s when Fetch less cost machine and add it to cart ... passed in 0.0009384s when Click on cart button ... passed in 0.8427s then verify the item is added to the cart ... passed in 15.04s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
